replies.body:
:/ That is highly inaccurate. Staff can tell the difference between skill and modifications, most of the time. There's always a first time for everything: nerfgun could've been legit before, but there's nothing stopping him from starting to use modifications. There isn't a jury. The moderator is the judge, and he/she decides whether or not he/she hacks, by him/herself, or with another/other mod/mods. Hackers are innocent until proven guilty, until a moderator proves him/her guilty in their eyes, and then they are banned.

        Instead of making such a flameful post, you can just keep silent while you silently urge nerf to appeal. ^-^
